function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of social distancing in the hospitality industry","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement strict social distancing measures and regular testing","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, temperature screening devices","People":"Employees in the hospitality industry","Owner":"Government agencies, companies, and industry organizations"},{"Description":"Increased workload in supermarkets","Impact":"Higher risk of customer congestion and disease transmission","Mitigation":"Deploy additional staff, implement effective crowd management strategies","Technologies":"Automated checkout systems, queue management software","People":"Customers and supermarket staff","Owner":"Supermarket management and industry organizations"}]}
